constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 46 (Thursday, March 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. CRAIG:
H.R. 1811.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 for the Commerce Clause
[Page H1357]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee for Indigenous Peoples of the United States.

title: To amend the Indian Health Care Improvement Act to authorize additional funding for planning, design, construction, modernization, and renovation of hospitals and outpatient health care facilities.
